div.p: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.

ul.li: Ability to drive a company vehicle to distribute & pick up packages
Excellent customer service and people skills
Time management and attention to detail
Positive attitude and a Team player
Familiarity with Apple products a plus
Ability to work overtime as needed

div.p: - Drive work vehicle to deliver & pick up packages from multiple buildings. - Recent shipping and receiving experience is required. - Able to lift 20 lbs repetitively, up to 50 lbs. - Process, sort and distribute inbound and outbound packages and mail from FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS, miscellaneous freight courier services, and offsite warehouse. - Use computers and mobile devices for data entry. - Use manual and electric pallet jack as needed. - Maintain and validate daily package delivery report.
Familiarity with Apple products a plus
